channel.title: Roggenbuck on Jake Roggenbuck
channel.description: Recent content in Roggenbuck on Jake Roggenbuck

item.description: Favorite languages: C, Rust, Go, C++, Python # Topics of interest: Math, Space, Computer Science, Machine Learning # Recent Projects # JakeRoggenbuck/regolith A server-side TypeScript and JavaScript library immune to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) attacks by using Rust and linear RegEx under the hood.
